document_data.caption: A map showing the Lluirflow in southwest Luiren.
document_data.name: River Tamthew
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Tamthew''', also called the '''Lluirflow''', was a small river found in southern [[Luiren]] in the [[Shining South]].
document_data.Geography: The river originated near the center of the southern section of the [[Southern Lluirwood]]. It flowed almost due south for approximately {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}} before reaching the [[Great Sea]] near Luiren's far southwest corner.
